nodes.text: "Quick-Shot" Quarl was a male Devaronian member of the Coronas criminal gang, active in the Coronet City on Corellia during the Galactic War. In 3639 BBY he was killed in the Black Hole region of the Labor Valley by Galactic Republic forces.
Quick-Shot Quarl appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC in the Black Hole. Killing him is required for a Republic-side daily quest.
